privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your right to privacy is sacred to us.

collection.item3: Browsing data and preferences to improve your experience
collection.item4: Payment information processed by secure partners (Stripe, MercadoPago)

usage.item4: Communicate news and offers (with your consent)

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Clear rules for an exceptional shopping experience.
terms.intro: Welcome to INSANYCK. By accessing and using our website, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before making any purchase. If you do not agree with any term, we recommend not using our services.

about.title: About INSANYCK
about.p1: INSANYCK is a luxury fashion brand focused on exclusive pieces and contemporary design. We operate as an e-commerce platform, connecting creators to consumers seeking excellence in clothing.
about.p2: Our commitment is to offer high-quality products, premium service, and a differentiated shopping experience.

products.title: Products and Prices
products.item1: All prices are displayed in Brazilian Reais (BRL) and include applicable taxes
products.item2: Images are illustrative; slight color variations may occur
products.item3: Size availability is subject to stock
products.item4: We reserve the right to correct pricing errors before order confirmation

payments.title: Payments
payments.intro: We accept the following payment methods:
payments.item3: Bank slip (clearing time up to 3 business days)
payments.security: All payments are processed by certified gateways (Stripe and MercadoPago), ensuring PCI-DSS security.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.item1: Deliveries throughout Brazil via Correios and partner carriers
shipping.item2: Deadlines calculated at checkout according to your ZIP code
shipping.item3: Tracking code sent by email after dispatch
shipping.item4: We are not responsible for delays caused by strikes or force majeure

returns.title: Exchanges and Returns

returns.item2: Product must be in original condition, with tags
returns.item3: First exchange free; others subject to shipping
returns.item4: Refund processed within 10 business days after receiving the product
returns.contact: To request an exchange or return, contact us via the email below.
